heading: ebay teams up with butterfield
subheading: ebay will offer antiques from butterfield &amp butterfield in a new auction category. through the partnership, the online auctioneer will also receive authentication services.
author: wired news report
text: new world meets old in a partnership announced thursday by auctioneers ebay and butterfield & butterfield. butterfield, the third-largest us auction house, said that it will soon offer antiques and fine arts online at ebay.ebay, better known for kitsch than antiques, will offer older items from butterfield in a new category, expected to be listed on ebay's home page in the second quarter of 1999.butterfield will bring an international network of auction houses from europe, the us, and australia. this network will offer authentication, appraisal, and consignment services.it will also extend these services to ebay's existing categories as part of a countermove to consumer complaints that the online company recently received about fraudulent goods.
